overview: This animated film tells about two boys. However, one of them is over forty years old, and, squeezed in the grip of hard work and a strict suit, he completely forgot about who he is. His son, a child of three or four years old, who just wanted to play hide-and-seek, albeit unintentionally, but should remind his father of his real nature. What about the mother of the family? As a true Creator, she only prepares the conditions for further events, then escaping from the scene… Perhaps to the moon?
title: Boys
